div.span: IF | The backup daily file's contents differ from the daily file.
ELSE
YES
NO
ELSE
When the user closes her text editor...
IF | Any of our tests from the previous step failed.
ELSE
YES
NO
IF | This command was already run earlier today.
Process any Todos which have a priority of 'A', 'B', or 'C'.
ASK | Is it OK to commit the changes made to the daily file?
ASK | Can we delete the backup daily file?
ASK | For verification / more information about Todo changes that we are unsure of.
Run a series of tests against each Todo remaining in the daily file.
Collect Todos to add to daily file.
Collect any todos left over in daily file from last run.
Collect any todos that have a priority greater than or equal to 'D'.
Prompt for Todos (using fuzzy matching) to add to daily file.
Create a backup daily file.
Open backup daily file in text editor.
Process all Todos in your inbox (i.e. all Todos tagged with the @inbox context).
Move any "done" Todos in the daily file to permenant storage.
Render the daily file after adding our newly collected Todos to it.
Commit the backup daily file's contents to the real daily file.
Process last N days of tickler Todos.
